summary: Delta Air Lines is a big airline company based in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. It's one of the oldest airlines in the world and operates thousands of flights daily to hundreds of destinations across six continents. Delta has many hubs, with the largest in Atlanta. It's known for being a large and successful airline, but in 2024, it faced some challenges with flight disruptions that affected its reputation. Delta employs around 100,000 people and is a key player in the global aviation industry.
title: Delta Air Lines
